00019 #include "DATFileWriter.h"
00020 #include "DATData.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 DATFileWriter::DATFileWriter(DATData &p) 
00025 { 
00026         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00027         pixelPos = 0;
00028         statsPos = 0;
00029         WriteHeaders();
00030 }
00031 
00032 DATFileWriter::~DATFileWriter() 
00033 {
00034         delete writer;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void DATFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00038 {
00039         writer->WriteHeader();
00040         DataGroupWriter* dataGroupWriter = &writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00041         dataGroupWriter->WriteHeader();
00042 
00043         DataSetWriterIt begin;
00044         DataSetWriterIt end;
00045         dataGroupWriter->GetDataSetWriters(begin, end);
00046         while(begin != end)
00047         {
00048                 dataSetWriter = &(*begin);
00049                 begin->WriteHeader();
00050                 SetFilePositions();
00051                 begin++;
00052         }
00053 }
00054 
00055 void DATFileWriter::WriteStats(const Uint16Vector &v)
00056 {
00057         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(statsPos);
00058         Uint16VectorConstIt begin = v.begin();
00059         Uint16VectorConstIt end = v.end();
00060         while(begin != end)
00061         {
00062                 dataSetWriter->Write(*begin);
00063                 begin++;
00064         }
00065         statsPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00066 }
00067 
00068 void DATFileWriter::WritePixels(const Uint16Vector &v)
00069 {
00070         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pixelPos);
00071         Uint16VectorConstIt begin = v.begin();
00072         Uint16VectorConstIt end = v.end();
00073         while(begin != end)
00074         {
00075                 dataSetWriter->Write(*begin);
00076                 begin++;
00077         }
00078         pixelPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00079 }
00080 
00081 void DATFileWriter::SetFilePositions()
00082 {
00083         const std::wstring &name = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetName();
00084         int32_t dataSetSz = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetSize();
00085         
00086         if(name == DAT_PIXEL)
00087         {
00088                 pixelPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00089                 pixelLimitPos = pixelPos + dataSetSz;
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093                 statsPos = writer->GetFilePos();
00094                 statsLimitPos = statsPos + dataSetSz;
00095         }
00096 
00097         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00098         dataSetWriter->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00099 }
